Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #time#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Silver Rupee Right Back

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Fire Trial Silver Rupee Inside Pillar

HC (Malon).text: ${12 68 31}Don't forget to stand up and stretch regularly.

HC (Rock Wall).text: I am @, hero of the Gossip Stones! Hear my name and tremble!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Forest Trial Silver Rupee Back Right

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #3# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Bottom Center

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Epona's Song#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #2# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Did you know that ReDead mourn their defeated friends?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #2# major items.
